title: Buy this instead of a Pixel 5! - Samsung S20 FE
description: Samsung added a new version of the S20, the Fan Edition. This phone is actually pretty surprising as it's not just a simple variation and it's $699!  Check out our merch as there might be something cool coming out tomorrow at   Buy Samsung S20 FE On Samsung (Paid Link):  On Amazon (Paid Link):  On BHPhoto (Paid Link):  On NewEgg (Paid Link):  On BestBuy (Paid Link):   Buy Samsung S20 5G On Samsung (Paid Link):  On Best Buy (Paid Link):  On Amazon (Paid Link):   On BHPhoto (Paid Link):  On NewEgg (Paid Link):   Buy MSI GS66 On Best Buy (Paid Link):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
